newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: Sri Lanka rupee closes barely moved.
newsitem.headline: Sri Lanka rupee closes barely moved.

text.p: The Sri Lanka rupee closed flat on low import covering demand and the perception that the Central Bank wanted to see low rates, dealers said.
The rupee closed at 57.26, after opening at its previous closing level of 57.25, they said.

"Only one state bank was covering imports, and speculators were absent since the rate is very close to the Central Bank top," said a Deutsche Bank dealer. The Central Bank's buying and selling prices were at 56.2122 and 57.3478.
Overnight call money closed at 13.5 percent, after rising to 15. --Colombo newsroom (941) 434319
